channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-14098] Logging task properties, and environment variables might contain passwords
item.description:
Hive MapredLocalTask Can Print Environment Passwords, like -Djavax.net.ssl.trustStorePassword.

The same could happen, when logging spark properties
item.summary: Logging task properties, and environment variables might contain passwords

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Removing password logging
